meanings.sent1: She kept an orra blanket in the closet for guests.

meanings.sent5: The orra key on the keychain was a backup in case the main one got lost.

meanings.sent1: The orra bird with colorful feathers caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: It was an orra sight to see a shooting star in the daytime.
meanings.sent3: The orra noise coming from the attic turned out to be a lost cat.
meanings.sent4: Her orra choice of outfit made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The orra plant in the garden bloomed only once a year.
